meanings.definition: Personal belongings that are worth a lot of money.
meanings.sent1: She kept her valuables in a safe.
meanings.sent2: It is important to keep your valuables secure.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought the shiny acorn was a valuable treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the most valuable thing in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun glinted off the valuables, making them sparkle.

meanings.definition: Items that are considered important or precious.
meanings.sent1: He treasured his valuables more than anything else.
meanings.sent2: Family heirlooms are often considered valuables.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the yarn ball was a valuable toy.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was a valuable gift that he cherished.
meanings.sent5: The old book held valuable information about the past.
